articles.author: Maziar Motamedi, Federica Marsi
articles.title: UK recognises Palestinian statehood 108 years after Balfour Declaration - Al Jazeera
articles.description: The decision, announced alongside Canada and Australia, comes as Israel continues its deadly destruction in Gaza.
articles.content: British Prime Minister Keir Starmer has announced the United Kingdoms decision to formally recognise a Palestinian state more than 100 years after the Balfour Declaration backed the establishment in … [+4430 chars]
